wikipedia_page.main: Theophila Gwatkin (née Palmer; 15 May 1757 - 4 July 1848) was a British painter.  She is described as an amateur artist and is best known for pictures painted of her by her uncle Sir Joshua Reynolds. She also compiled, added a preface, footnote glosses and a dictionary of dialect terms to her mother's, Mary Reynolds, A Devonshire Dialogue.
